column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Definitely the Lou and Malnati namesake pizzas are the way to go.  Delicious
column3: and filling.  My only complaint aside from the wait was that I'm not a huge fan of the crust.  It's very... crusty.  It's a bit hard - not soft
column4: yet crispy as I like.  But to each
column5: his own.  Still a definitely great place!
